entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 6.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
